application_instruction: Note: By applying to this position your application is automatically submitted to the following locations: Boulder, CO, USA; Mountain View, CA, USA
description:
gTech’s Business and Outsourcing Strategy and Services team (gBOSS) provides consultative services to gTech, the Global Business Organization (GBO), and Google at large, enabling each part of our business by developing innovative, scalable, and compliant solutions that allow gTech to run efficient operations with the best vendor partners at optimal cost while minimizing risk.

The team develops practical and innovative ways to address some of the most complex business challenges to keep Google thriving. We anticipate how decisions are made, persistently explore and uncover the business needs of our key clients and understand how our range of product and service offerings can enable their business success. We also lead the global vendor strategy across all organizations, manage business risks and deliver amazing client experiences for Google’s top customers and partners. Using influencing and relationship-building skills, we provide Google-caliber client service, legal guidance, research, and market analysis.

As a Risk Program Manager, you'll be managing risk operations, be a risk consultant to the organization and manage risk programs for agents across the gTech organization and Google as a whole. You will work with various stakeholders in providing subject matter expertise on risk consultations. The position will have a vertical reporting structure as well as cross-functional team responsibilities for program management. Through diligent risk management and programs you will enable performance, agility and growth while keeping the organization safe, secure and compliant.

Google creates products and services that make the world a better place, and gTech’s role is to help bring them to life. Our teams of solution-oriented trusted advisors support millions of customers globally. Our solutions are rooted in our technical skill, product expertise, and a thorough understanding of our customers’ complex needs. Whether the answer is a bespoke solution to solve a unique problem, or a new tool that can scale across Google, everything we do aims to ensure our customers benefit from the full potential of Google products.

To learn more about gTech, check out our video.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 7 years of experience in IT security and/or within risk management, including access management, risk assessment, audit and compliance.
  • Experience with all Cyber security domains.
  • Experience in IT security (e.g. CISM, CISSP, NIST, ISO 27000) and/or risk management standards (e.g. ISO 31000, COSO ERM).

Preferred qualifications:

  • Demonstrated excellence with program management skills and ability to develop solutions to problems with unclear or ambiguous guidelines.
  • Ability to apply critical problem solving skills and propose solutions that optimize operational performance
  • Strong leadership, organizational, stakeholder management and ability to thrive in a fast-paced, cross-functional, global team environment.
  • Outstanding verbal and written communication and presentation skills with the ability to interact with technical and non-technical groups across different levels
  • Eagerness to learn new things, discover emerging and new trends and willingness to lean in and get hands dirty.
  • Ability and willingness to travel as required.
responsibilities:
• Design and implement global security programs and solutions for a varied and complex service portfolio.
  • Conduct risk assessments to identify risks and recommend how to mitigate risks.
  • Monitor risk landscape and identify emerging and future risks.
  • Build relationships and partner with cross-functional stakeholders across verticals (ads and users) as well as Security, Privacy, Legal, and Product/Engineering.
  • Issue resolution for security related areas: Identity Access Management, IT Risk Management.
title: Risk Solutions Consultant, gTech Business and Outsourcing Strategy and Services
